race.name: Goliath
race.age: Goliaths have lifespans comparable to humans. They enter adulthood in their late teens and usually live less than a century.
race.height: Goliaths are between 7 and 8 feet tall.

feature.name: Stone’s Endurance
feature.shortDescription: You can focus yourself to occasionally shrug off injury. When you take damage, you can use your reaction to roll a d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled, and reduce the damage by that total. After you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

feature.name: Powerful Build
feature.shortDescription: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

feature.name: Mountain Born
feature.shortDescription: You’re acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet. You’re also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master’s Guide.
